page.title: 03Haxby Road Child,Life-style.
page.content: A typical day in my life. I get up at 7 o'clock,dress and wake up my brother.My mother shouts,"Get the kettle on!"We have breakfast of cornflakes and tea.Then we get washed. We have twenty pence to spend. We meet our friends then go to school.At a quarter past nine,after assembly,we start work.We do Maths,Environmental Studies,English,Topic.At playtime we play football.For dinner we have beans,chips and fish fingers,then sponge and custard.We do Art,Craft, Music,Computer or History.School ends at a quarter to four.I have my tea of chips,salad or cold ham.Then I play snooker or go to the adventure playground.I go to bed at 9.30 p.m.,or 10 p.m.
